decision_conditions: The proposed development does not constitute permitted development by virtue  of the provisions of Article 3. Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A Sub Paragraph A.1 (e) (i) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as the alterations to the front single storey bay window would extend beyond a wall which forms the principal elevation of the original dwellinghouse.

The proposed development does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of Article 3. Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B Sub Paragraph B.1 (d) (ii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as the alterations to the front two storey bay roof would extend beyond a wall which forms the principal elevation of the original dwellinghouse.
description: Conversion of roof space to habitable use to include a hip to gable extension, rear dormer and 3 front roof lights with alterations to front bay wandows (Application for a Certificate of Lawful Development for a Proposed Development)
